评论详情: I was in need of sweaters for travel. I liked the say this looked in the picture but it doesn't look quite the same on me. The material is a little itchy but I'll be wearing thermals underneath so I hope it won't bother me. The smell is a little off putting because you can't just wash it away. Washing should be done on delicate cycle with flat drying. So at lot of maintenance but the sweater is acceptable. I just wish it looked a bit more stylish.
I'm not a sweater person but this one is long in the arms, comfortable, cute and a good value for my money.
Really love this sweater. It’s very soft. Oversized, but still cute on. I’ve worn multiple times.
Soft and warm and the fit is very flattering! I will be purchasing more

I love the weight, feel in the look of this.  It’s heavy, but I didn’t feel hot in it and 60° weather.  It’s nice in between not too hot not too cold sweater, but if it’s freezing outside, I would still be comfortable with a jacket on.  It’s nice and soft and feels like a sweater that could be more expensive in the stores.
Great sweater have it on now!!! Love the fit & style
Love the color, the fit, and how soft the sweater is.  Absolutely love wearing it.  Received lots of great compliments.

If you are looking for the perfect oversized sweater this is it.  The material is so soft and the design is perfection leaving no itchy stitching.  The Nutmeg color is perfect combination of muted gray/brown. You are going to want this sweater in every color. ♥️
Soft and not itchy. Comfy but not sloppy looking. I’ll buy other colors.
It is so cozy and warm!
The softest sweater ever! Great thickness and very cozy. I went one size up because I wanted an oversized look. Sweater did not disappoint and would buy in another color.
Comfy and warm.  I realize it an oversized sweater, but much bigger than I had hoped.
Perfect color white.. heavy and warm.. shipped fast
warm and very comfortable

评论概述: Color is way off from what I thought I was getting.
评论详情: Did not like the color

Super soft and perfect length fur a chunky sweater! High enough neck to provide coverage, but not so high that it feels like a mock turtle. Feels and looks expensive. Would consider buying another in a different color.
I have a large chest size so this was not flattering at all. If you're a size 0-6 maybe it would.
The fabric is very thick, high quality. The cuffs have a little weight to them making them fall nicely. It’s so comfy and cute! I did a M for an oversized look. I am 5’6 , 140lbs.

This sweater is the definition of fast fashion. It started to pull after 1 wear. After each wear it gets worse and worse. Also, EVERYTHING clings to it! Hair, lint, dust, etc. The cut and color is okay, it’s soft, but because of the rapid signs of wear I regret buying this.

This sweater is mislabeled as oversized. I can only guess the AI model is about 5'2. I am tallish at 5'11 and the sleeves lack a good 2+ inches from reaching my actual wrist. There is a sewn in large cuff that I will try and let out without making a hole  The length of the hem is just below my waistline, not longer as represented in the pics and description. I am between at 12 and 14 and I ordered a large. It fits me as a true to size large would. The material is thick. The quality is mid. The cost probably should have been a bit cheaper. Unless you are short, I would not recommend.
Immediately after pulling the sweater out of the bag I realized it was covered in hair. Can’t even comment on fit because I won’t be trying this item on in this condition.

When I put it on it felt nice and I liked the weight of it. I’m 5’4” 125-126# and it’s a little longer and wider than I’d like, but I’m going to keep it, because it’s so comfy. It will definitely be nice wearing it with jeans that show my crack when I bend/sit down, since it’s long enough to cover.  🤣🤣

评论概述: Loved it. Fit just as pictured
评论详情: The fabric is breathable and somewhat lightweight. Completely comfortable. Color was lovely. Would buy again. Can use handwashing. But may take to dry cleaner. Would buy again. Bought suggested size. Fit as pictured Good quality.
Kind of scratchy material.. I thought it would be very soft but it’s not at all. It’s just ok. An upside is it’s not every see through.

For 45$ I'm happy this sweater is actually exceptional, heavy, soft and hopefully it retains shape after wearing it. Very pleased. I ordered my size, don't want the baggy look. It's still has an oversized feel.
So soft and comfy. Get so many compliments on this. Ordered the raspberry one. Already own a white one and green one. I could live in these sweaters!

I know, I know, EVERY influencer loves these and has been saying they’re a “must-have”, so I bought two because I’m a sucker. I unfortunately didn’t get a picture, because I put it on for work EXACTLY how the influencer styled it- with black tights, a lace slip skirt, and black combat boots. I didn’t love the texture and thought it was scratchy, and the look was just too oversized, but I was already dressed and had to get to work. It was definitely nice and thick, and I loved the extra long sleeves that allow me to pull my hands up into my sweater sleeves when my hands are cold, but it was too scratchy and wide for me. I lasted about 2 hours in this before I ran down the street to H&M and grabbed a similar but softer and smaller sweater (for $17 less!!) and changed in the car. For reference, I’m 5’7 and 108-112 and a much smaller size would’ve fit better and still been cute and oversized. If you’re around my size, this will be way too big. Lastly, the price point on these is crazy, these sweaters are $30 sweaters at most. I sent these back and got two similar but softer and not so “boxy” sweaters for the price of one.

评论概述: I chose the brown color, it’s kind of a dark cinnamon shade.color!

I don’t yet know how well it washes and wears or if it pills and sheds. I’m hoping for a good outcome!! 🤞🏻🤞🏻🤞🏻

There is no draping in this material they elude to as sweater knit.  It is not comfortable to me because the material doesn’t allow your skin to breathe or drape.  I look like a block in it lol.  I love oversized sweaters and this is way oversized which would be awesome if the material bent any.

I normally wear a medium so I went with a medium and it fits oversized. I love the thickness of the fabric and the sleeves are great! I would buy another color for sure. It’s a pain but I hand wash and hang dry.

My sweater that I ordered for Christmas came today and so I tried it on to see if it would fit. I absolutely love it,  the feel of the fabric,  the color purple 💜 it's going to another favorite sweater.  I love it!!
Not true to color, picture is clearly white or possibly off white, its got more yellow in it and it smells AWFUL would try to wash it but dont want to risk getting stuck with it
I do like the sweater and is true to size. I gave it to a friend because I can't wear a tight neck. Wish it came in a v-neck.

I LOVE this sweater!  It's super chunky and is meant to be over-sized.  That being said, I'm normally an XL in sweaters (I don't like them tight) and I had to get a medium in this.  But other than that I love it.  I love the color (I got purple), I love the softness - it feels like you're wearing a blanket.  I love the chunky sleeves.  Just love everything about this!

The *LILLUSORY Women's Oversized Sweater* is an absolute must-have for the colder months! This fuzzy, chunky sweater is incredibly soft and cozy, perfect for lounging or layering on chilly days. The oversized fit offers a relaxed and comfortable style that pairs beautifully with jeans, leggings, or skirts. The long sleeves and thick knit make it wonderfully warm without being too bulky.  What really stands out is the plush texture of the fabric, which feels luxurious and gentle against the skin. The chunky knit gives it a stylish, cozy vibe that is both trendy and practical for winter. It’s also surprisingly easy to care for, holding its shape and softness even after several washes.  If you're looking for a cozy, stylish sweater to keep you warm and fashionable this winter, I highly recommend the *LILLUSORY Women's Oversized Sweater*. It’s the perfect combination of comfort and style!
I got my usual size. The arms are so so so long. It is not flattering. I’m even 5’7 and it’s made for a 6’2 person or more. I do not recommend.
Got as a gift for my wife, she loves it, the texture is a little weird when you first get it, but that's fixed after the first wash.
I didn’t even open the packet as the sweater is very yellow cream… not white or even off white!

So there is another brand/seller on here that makes these sweaters. They look identical and use the same pictures. I originally purchased from them and the sweater felt like a cloud. But needed a black sweater so purchased from this seller by mistake thinking it was the original one. The sweater does look identical in every way, except the fabric is totally different. This sellers fabric is scratchy while the other is super soft chenille like. I needed a black sweater pronto for an event so I kept it, but not pleased. I will say it kept me very warm on a cold blustery day and gave me look I was going for, but in future will need to wear it with a shirt underneath adding bulk. Not so with the other brand/seller. Purchase your true to fit size for perfect oversized look. Material is thick. Doesn't wrinkle. I would recommend the other brand over this one.  Update- this came with a slight odor, just thought it was new sweater smell. Washed it according to directions. And it definitely has some sort of chemical smell that didn't wash out. Yuck. Wish I could get a refund on this but already washed and wore it. So disappointed. Don't buy at least the black one.
After I washed it. It shrank in every way
Just as described, it is an oversized sweater and is super cute on especially with the red skirt. I’d buy again.
Love this product. Filled nicely

Soo comfy and soft. Great quality. Love 🤎it.

评论概述: Runs Large & Colors are NOT as shown
评论详情: I liked the look of this sweater in the photos and loved the cuffs.  There are multiple sellers of this product under the Amazon umbrella so please keep looking if you want a specific color. I did find the colors were not as photographed.  Also, I bought this in a  size smaller and EXTREMELY glad I did.  I generally wear an XL and purchased a L.  Fits well, and not too loose.  The fabric is nice but could be a little bit softer and smoother but overall totally wearable for work or play.
The sweater is made very well.

I was a little skeptical about how good the quality would be because it was so affordable, but when i opened it it was soooo obviously well made. It's a nice heavy, soft, and plush material. It fits exactly how I wanted it to! I will say as a short girl (5ft) it is a bit longer than it is on the model but it's still so cute and it's not so long that it makes it look frumpy. I am in love

Very comfortable material. Material is high quality to make it look more expensive than it is. Although it says oversized in the title it was still larger than I expected. I would suggest sizing down unless you want a very oversized look! I did still keep it as it looks cute with leggings and is extremely warm!

Love this sweater. It’s super loose and comfy. True to size.
